      • getWindow

        public static java.awt.Window getWindow(java.awt.Component component)
        Returns the first window ancestor of the component. Note that this method returns the component itself if it is a window.
        Parameters:
        component - the component used to find corresponding window
        Returns:
        the first window ancestor of the component; or null if the component is not a window and is not contained inside a window

      • findParentByCondition

        public static java.awt.Component findParentByCondition(java.awt.Component c,
                                                       java.util.function.Predicate<? super java.awt.Component> condition)

      • getParentOfType

        public static <T> T getParentOfType(java.lang.Class<? extends T> type,
                                    java.awt.Component component)
        Searches above in the component hierarchy starting from the specified component. Note that the initial component is also checked.
        Parameters:
        type - expected class
        component - initial component
        Returns:
        a component of the specified type, or null if the search is failed
        See Also:
        SwingUtilities.getAncestorOfClass(java.lang.Class<?>, java.awt.Component)
